metadata.Description: The ability to use digital technologies and tools to access, evaluate, and create information.

entities.Description: Strategies developed by governments to guide the digital transformation of their countries.

relations.Description: Digital literacy implements national digital transformation strategies to ensure the effective use of digital technologies and tools.
relations.Subject: digital literacy

relations.Description: Digital literacy funds national digital transformation strategies to support the development and implementation of digital literacy programs.

relations.Description: Digital literacy focuses on national digital transformation strategies to prioritize the acquisition and improvement of digital skills.
relations.Subject: digital literacy

relations.Description: Digital literacy is an integral part of national digital transformation strategies to enable individuals and communities to participate in the digital economy.
relations.Subject: digital literacy

relations.Description: Digital literacy partners with national digital transformation strategies to collaborate on initiatives and projects that promote digital literacy.
relations.Subject: digital literacy

relations.Description: Digital literacy contributes to national digital transformation strategies by empowering individuals with the necessary skills and knowledge to navigate the digital landscape.
relations.Subject: digital literacy

relations.Description: Digital literacy monitors the progress and impact of national digital transformation strategies to ensure the effectiveness of digital literacy initiatives.
relations.Subject: digital literacy

relations.Description: Digital literacy targets national digital transformation strategies to align its efforts with the overall goals and objectives of the strategies.
relations.Subject: digital literacy

relations.Description: Digital literacy addresses the needs and challenges identified in national digital transformation strategies to provide targeted support and interventions.

national digital transformation strategies
relations.Description: National digital transformation strategies implement sustainable energy projects to promote the use of clean and renewable energy sources.

relations.Subject: national digital transformation strategies
relations.Description: National digital transformation strategies allocate funds for research and development in the field of sustainable energy to drive innovation and technological advancements.

relations.Subject: energy poverty indices
relations.Description: Energy poverty indices implement energy access programs to provide affordable and reliable energy services to underserved communities.
